---
category: news
title: "China’s DriveGPT could leave companies rushing to catch up"
excerpt: "Beijing’s regulatory guidelines set a framework for companies to follow, but China’s self-driving industry has grown beyond this. TikTok’s owner ByteDance Ltd, along with startup Haomo Zhixing Technology, backed by domestic automaker Great Wall Motor Co, have established the country’s biggest computing centre for autonomous-driving infrastructure."
